content.question: Explain the effect of expressing only S1 on the cells in culture 1. Describe the effect of expressing combinations of protein S and protein R on the survival of the cells in culture 2 AND culture 3.

frqParts.text: Explain the effect of expressing only S1 on the cells in culture 1. Describe the effect of expressing combinations of protein S and protein R on the survival of the cells in culture 2 AND culture 3.
